annotation.text: The graph of three functions labeled f of x, g of x, and h of x, all of which converge at the point 0 comma 1
The topmost function h of x is a horizontal line through the point 0 comma 1
The middle function g of x gently ascends to the point 0 comma 1 and then gently descends
The function f of x remains below g, ascends more steeply to the point 0 comma 1 and then descends more steeply than g
